intent_atoms.description: Provide typed parsers and export coverage for upcoming codec payload descriptors (Dolby Vision dvvC, AV1 av1C, VP9 vpcC, Dolby AC-4 dac4, MPEG-H mhaC) so ISOInspector can surface complete metadata as new fixtures land.
Catalog fixtures and decoding references for each targeted payload descriptor, confirming licensing coverage.
Implement typed CodecPayload models and registry wiring for all targeted descriptors with graceful fallback for unknown variants.
Extend unit tests and JSON snapshot baselines to include the new payload fields without regressing existing coverage.
Update CLI/UI documentation snippets to showcase the additional codec metadata fields once fixtures validate.
Feature flags or guarded registry entries must prevent incomplete payloads from shipping without fixtures.
Reuse existing bit reader utilities for packed-field decoding and ensure colour metadata maps onto existing enums.
Coordinate fixture acquisition updates through scripts/generate_fixtures.py to record checksums and licenses alongside new samples.

functional_units.name: Typed CodecPayload Models
functional_units.description: Defines strongly‑typed data structures for each codec payload descriptor (dvvC, av1C, vpcC, dac4, mhaC) and registers them in the system.

functional_units.name: Codec Payload Registry Wiring
functional_units.description: Registers codec payload parsers with a central registry, including graceful fallback handling for unknown or incomplete variants.

functional_units.name: Fixture Cataloging and Validation
functional_units.description: Catalogs test fixtures and decoding references for each targeted payload descriptor, verifying licensing coverage and checksum integrity.

functional_units.name: Unit Test Extension and Snapshot Updates
functional_units.description: Extends existing unit tests to cover new codec metadata fields and updates JSON snapshot baselines without regressing current coverage.

functional_units.name: CLI/UI Documentation Snippets Update
functional_units.description: Updates command‑line interface and user‑interface documentation to display the additional codec metadata fields once fixtures are validated.

functional_units.name: Feature Flag / Guarded Registry Implementation
functional_units.description: Introduces feature flags or guarded registry entries so incomplete payloads do not ship without corresponding fixtures.

functional_units.name: Bit Reader Utility Reuse
functional_units.description: Reuses existing bit reader utilities for decoding packed fields (e.g., AV1 operating point flags) and maps colour metadata onto existing enums.
